name: Petronas Towers
description: Once the world's tallest, these 88-story towers bear a modern Islamic design & a visitor skybridge.

name: Batu Caves
tagline: Hindu temple set in limestone caves
description: Limestone caves at the top of steep steps housing Hindu temples & shrines, plus a huge deity statue.

name: Bukit Bintang
description: Bukit Bintang is the shopping and entertainment district of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. It encompasses Jalan Bukit Bintang and its immediate surrounding areas. The area has long been Kuala Lumpur's

name: Kuala Lumpur Tower
description: One of the world's tallest, this landmark tower offers scenic city views & a revolving restaurant.

name: Kuala Lumpur City Centre
description: Kuala Lumpur’s dynamic, high-rise City Centre is known for upscale fashion malls, luxury hotels and expansive views from the futuristic Petronas Twin Towers. Overlooked by skyscrapers, the green

name: Sunway Lagoon
tagline: Vast theme park with rides & water games
description: Sprawling amusement park with a water zone, rides, a zoo & outdoor activities, plus dining & events.

name: Central Market, Kuala Lumpur
description: Cultural heritage site with restored art deco facade offering shopping, eateries & an outdoor stage.

name: Suria KLCC
description: Opened in 1998, this retail mall on 6 floors houses shops & services, plus eateries & a prayer room.

name: National Mosque of Malaysia
description: Hosting up to 15,000 worshippers, Malaysia's national mosque has gardens, a library & a prayer hall.

name: Kuala Lumpur Bird Park
description: Thousands of colorful birds in free-roaming areas, walk-through aviaries & traditional enclosures.

name: Merdeka Square, Kuala Lumpur
tagline: Historic square with an iconic flagpole
description: This landmark square has a 96m flagpole to mark the site of the first Malayan flag-raising.

name: Resorts World Genting
description: Contemporary venue with understated rooms offering restaurants, 2 bars & an outdoor pool.

name: Lake Gardens, Kuala Lumpur
tagline: Lush tropical park with a pond & a cafe
description: Botanical gardens featuring tropical plants & rare fruit trees, plus a fish pond, waterfall & cafe.

name: Sultan Abdul Samad Building
description: Grand 1800s government building featuring copper domes & a large clocktower with a 1-ton bell.

name: Aquaria KLCC
tagline: Large aquarium with sharks & a tunnel
description: Expansive aquarium offering 5,000 exhibits, a clear tunnel, feeding shows & shark cage dives.

name: KLCC Park
description: 50-acre respite offering a kids' playground, paths, a wading pool & choreographed fountain displays.

name: National Museum
description: Interactive museum of Malaysian culture & history from prehistoric times to the present day.

name: Jamek Mosque
description: Opened in 1909, this colorful, airy mosque once served as the main mosque in the city.

name: Thean Hou Temple
description: 6-tiered temple built in 1989, featuring a prayer hall with 3 altars & ornate, colorful details.

name: Islamic Arts Museum Malaysia
tagline: Islamic artifacts in a modern space
description: Contemporary museum offering displays of historical Islamic items, plus a restaurant & library.

name: Kuala Lumpur Butterfly Park
description: Expansive plant- & flower-filled garden with over 5,000 butterflies, koi ponds & a gift shop.

name: National Zoo of Malaysia
description: Open-concept zoo featuring a wide range of domestic & exotic animals, from elephants to seals.

name: Sri Mahamariamman Temple, Kuala Lumpur
description: 1800s Hindu temple, Kuala Lumpur's oldest, featuring a monumental, ornately carved entrance tower.

name: Kuala Lumpur railway station
description: The Kuala Lumpur railway station is a railway station located in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Completed in 1910 to replace an older station on the same site, the station was Kuala Lumpur's railway

name: Pudu Sentral
tagline:
The Pudu Sentral is the main local service bus terminus in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. It was opened in 1976 by the late former Prime Minister Tun Hussein Onn.
Long-distance buses no longer arrive

name: National Monument
tagline: Monument to the freedom fighters of 1945
description: Round 41m obelisk honoring those who died in the 1945 Battle of Surabaya against the British.

name: KL Forest Eco Park
tagline: Rain forest preserve with a canopy walk
description: Situated within the city, this rain forest has several nature trails & a forest canopy walkway.

name: Istana Negara, Jalan Istana
description: The Royal Museum along Jalan Istana was the former residence of the Yang di-Pertuan Agong of Malaysia. It stands on a 13 acre site, located on a commanding position on the slope of a hill of

name: Istana Negara, Jalan Tuanku Abdul Halim
tagline: Prominent royal palace with golden domes
description: An iconic landmark, this grand royal palace with golden domes is a popular place to take photos.

name: Bukit Nanas
description: Bukit Nanas, meaning "Pineapple Hill", is a small hill in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. It contains the only virgin tropical rain forest left in the heart of Kuala Lumpur. The Bukit Nanas Forest Reserve

name: Titiwangsa Lake Gardens
description: Titiwangsa Lake Gardens is a lake garden in Titiwangsa, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

name: Planetarium Negara
description: Designed to resemble a mosque, this planetarium offers a space theater, exhibits & an observatory.

name: Berjaya Times Square Theme Park
description: Berjaya Times Square Theme Park is an indoor theme park on the 5th to 8th floors of Berjaya Times Square, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. It was conceived as the "largest indoor, all weather, all ages

name: Royal Selangor Club
description: The Royal Selangor Club is a social club in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, founded in 1884 by the British who ruled Malaya. The club is situated next to the Dataran Merdeka, or Independence Square,

name: Petrosains, The Discovery Centre
description: Modern museum focused on the science & technology of the energy industry, with a cafe & gift shop.

name: Chinatown Kuala Lumpur
description: Lively, colorful Chinatown is centered on Petaling Street, known for its fashion shops and a large covered market with produce, clothes and accessories. Local artists sell paintings and crafts

name: Bukit Tabur
tagline: Landmark hill with trails & scenic views
description: Part of Klang Gates Quartz Ridge, this hill features rare plants, hiking trails & panoramic views.

name: Sin Sze Si Ya Temple
description: Chinese-style Taoist temple, founded in 1864, with antiques on display & fortune-telling sticks.

name: Pusat Pelancongan Malaysia
description: Hub for tourist info, a gift shop & other services, plus on-site festivals & music performances.

name: KidZania Kuala Lumpur
tagline: Theme park with real-life job simulation
description: Sprawling children's theme park offering immersive career role-play, from firefighter to surgeon.

name: Pusat Sains Negara
description: Science & learning center featuring interactive exhibits & play areas for young kids & toddlers.

name: Petronas Philharmonic Hall
tagline: Modern concert venue for classic music
description: Classical music hall featuring a 885-seat theater with an adjustable ceiling for optimum acoustics.

name: Petronas Gallery
tagline: Contemporary art gallery in a skyscraper
description: Modern art gallery at the Petronas Twin Towers with exhibits from local & international artists.

name: Istana Budaya
tagline: Theatre, musical theatre, concert, and art
description: The Istana Budaya or also known as the Palace of Culture, is Malaysia's main venue for all types of theatre including musical theatre, operetta, classical concerts and opera from local and international

name: Dayabumi Complex
description: The Dayabumi Complex is a major landmark in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. It houses several commercial facilities and is one of the earliest skyscrapers in the city.

name: PNB 118
tagline: PNB 118 is a 118-storey, 644-metre megatall skyscraper currently under construction in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
